snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include using Bitcoin to back up claims of ownership by showing time and date of possession, and patterns made with...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include using Bitcoin to back up claims of ownership by showing time and date of possession, and patterns made with sand, sound and math.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Proof via Bitcoin, and Images From Sounds and Sand
